channel.title: math.SP updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.SP updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Finite-Rank Optimizers for the mass--supercritical Lieb--Thirring and Hardy--Lieb--Thirring Inequalities
item.description: arXiv:2510.24148v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We establish the existence of finite-rank operators for an interpolation version of the Lieb--Thirring inequality in the mass--supercritical case, thereby extending a result of Hong, Kwon, and Yoon in 2019 to the full parameter regime. Our method also applies to the Hardy--Lieb--Thirring inequality, where the existence of optimizers faces additional difficulties due to the singularity of the inverse-square potential.
item.dc:creator: Giao Ky Duong, Thi Minh Thao Le, Phan Th\`anh Nam, Phuoc-Tai Nguyen

item.title: Eigenvalues of Universal Covers and the Matching Polynomial
item.description: arXiv:2510.05041v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: In this work, we prove that the universal and maximal abelian covers of a finite multi-graph have the same eigenvalues. This result strengthens a recent theorem of Li, Magee, Sabri, and Thomas (2025) and answers one of their questions. Our proof builds upon their new characterization of the point spectrum of maximal abelian covers in terms of matching polynomials. It is based on the theory of the matching polynomial and its Gallai-Edmonds decomposition.
item.dc:creator: Thom\'as Jung Spier
